recipe.title: Pesto Garden Pasta For The Whole Family Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; grated parmesan cheese ; (55 g)
4 cups ; pasta, short, such as farfalle or penne ; (800 g)
1 cup ; yellow cherry tomato, halved ; (200 g)
¼ cup ; red onion, sliced ; (35 g)

steps.step: Add the basil, olive oil, Parmesan, almond butter, lemon juice, garlic, lemon zest, salt, and pepper to a blender. Blend until smooth and set aside.
Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
Drain and transfer the pasta to a large serving bowl.
Add the grape tomatoes, yellow tomatoes, red onion, and mozzarella balls to the pasta.
Pour the pesto sauce over the pasta.

Enjoy!
